translated: The Book of Conditional Relations🔽The Chapter on the Faculties🔽The Triad on the Categories🔽With an object that is clung to and subject to cankers,🔽With an object that is not clung to and subject to cankers,

original: Dhammapaccanīya (2), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1)🔽7.4. Upādinnattika🔽Naupādinnupādāniyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naupādinnupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe….🔽Naanupādinnupādāniyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanupādinnupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe….🔽Naanupādinnaanupādāniyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanupādinnaanupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi  upādinnattika  na aupādinnupādāniyam dhammam paṭicca na aupādinnupādāniyaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pe  na anupādinnupādāniyam dhammam paṭicca na anupādinnupādāniyaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pe  na anupādinna anupādāniyam dhammam paṭicca na anupādinna anupādāniyaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta
translated: With an object that is neither clung to nor subject to cankers,

original: Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa, adhipatiyā ekavīsa …pe… āsevane sattarasa …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
analyzed: hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa adhipatiyā ekavīsa pe āsevane sattarasa pe avigate ekūnatisa
translated: In the cause, there are twenty-nine; in the object, there are twenty-four; in the predominance, there are twenty-one; … in the support, there are twenty-one; … in the proximity, there are twenty-one; … in the dissociation, there are twenty-one; … in the presence, there are twenty-one; … in the absence, there are twenty-one; … in the past, there are twenty-one; … in the future, there are twenty-one; … in the present, there are twenty-one; … in the connected, there are twenty-one; … in the unassociated, there are twenty-one; … in the condition, there are twenty-nine; in the non-condition, there are twenty-one; … in the root, there are twenty-one; … in the non-root, there are twenty-one; … in the dissociate, there are twenty-one; … in the unacquired, there are twenty-one; … in the acquired, there are twenty-one; … in the non-acquired-and-non-acquired, there are twenty-one; … in the past-and-present, there are twenty-one; … in the past-and-future, there are twenty-one; … in the present-and-past, there are twenty-one; … in the present-and-future, there are twenty-one; … in the future-and-present, there are twenty-one; … in the past-and-present-and-future, there are twenty-one; … in the non-past-and-non-present-and-non-future, there are twenty-one; … in the past-and-non-future, there are twenty-one; … in the future-and-non-past, there are twenty-one; … in the present-and-non-past, there are twenty-one; … in the past-and-future-and-non-present, there are twenty-one; … in the past-and-present-and-non-future,
